text: Abhaaaa. I've known you since coaching days. From being a shy introvert girl you've grown so much and become a confident bold person. I was so glad to have someone from the same city in college. I'm sorry for that scary train wala adventure. Ab to mai korba me nahi rehti but jab bhi aungi tere ghar pakka milne aungi. Cheers to many more years of friendship <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Sabse pehla interaction tujhse Nainital me hua tha teri gf ke sath XD. I didn't know that time we'd become such good friends by the end. Damn tune kitne spicy momos khilaye the campus gate pe. You've always been there for me whenever I asked and even when I didn't. You never failed to involve me in any plans. Thanks for looking out for me at my worst and always saving daru for me :P You're an amazing friend! I love the enthusiasm you put in planning treats and trips. Hope that we'll spend more time together in the future! Take care <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Hi Adi. This memoir cannot do justice to what I actually feel about you. I have always looked up to you and will continue to do that. Can't remember the first time we met but yeah after talking to you a couple of times I knew right away you'd be my go to person. I annoy you so much with all the grievances of my life but you never fail to make me feel better. You continue to have faith in me when I don't. You keep me going no matter how hard the days get. There are so many things I wanna thank you for starting with you always telling me to prioritise myself to you quoting my feelings for me. You are an incredibly amazing human being. Please don't ever change. I'm looking forward to gossiping about job life with you. Meet me soon. Love you loads! 

I just wish I could win some arguments with you and find more ways to irritate you.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Thank you for always helping me out. Oat and acad area wali walk, Antaragni nights, Goa ki flight me cringe bollywood movie dekhna, Hall 13 canteen me milna every fucking time (still don't understand kya telepathy thi) and teri last day ki poem, made me cry. Wish to create more memories with you. Let's plan a trip soon. Till then, take care!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
You cannot imagine the satisfaction I have that we're going to spend more time together and this was not the end because we started to bond last months me hi. We had so much fun together holi party, photoshoots, games and wo prop wali party. Still can't believe you were high on sleep that day but managed to rock the dance floor! 
There was a time when night out ke baad I would just hope ki Ananya jagi ho. You will always be my breakfast buddy! Can't wait to see you again in Amex and cook breakfast together this time â¤ï¸

And yes, I give you the freedom to believe my love life exists because of you but nvm you already believe it ðŸ˜‚
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Anchal bro! I could survive Techkriti because of you. Beech me when you stopped coming to hall 1 and was planning to leave, it scared the shit out of me. It would've been impossible without you. Hall 13 ka illegal stay, chowpatty me pav bhaji and spring rolls, holi party, planning tech summit with you, complaining about the existence of hall 1, bitching about almost all the team members, I had so much fun with you! Will never forget how we used to wander around for dinner and jahan Raghav dikh jate the unse treat le lete the. I am really glad to be the first person who got you drunk. You were so damn cute drink karne ke baad. I wish we could have more such parties. Photoshoot was all about you and me I guess? :P perfectly match karke gaye the. Let's plan a trip soon. I need to see more of bhand Anchal. Love you loads. â¤ï¸
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Cannot describe, cannot express, Cannot put it in words what you mean to me. You are my sister, my soulmate, my best friend, and everything. Thank you for just existing and keeping me alive through my hardest days. I will never forget how we would look at each other in a room full of people and understand the mood, and it would just be enough knowing that you were there. Whenever itâ€™s 2:00 am, I still imagine that youâ€™d knock on my door, and we would talk for hours about literally everything. I love you so much. Looking forward to many more years of friendship. Baki call pe <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Anuj yaar. Hum first year ke baad touch me kyun nahi the? I'm really glad ki mai Techkriti me ayi and tujhse dosti hui. You are a trustworthy person and an amazing friend. 

Itni memories hai tere sath. Techkriti ka holi celebration, team meetings ke baad rant or bitching karna ðŸ˜‚, daru parties (although sirf do hi ho payi and I regret missing tera or Nimish ka Shiv ji moment), tech summit plan karna, had so much fun with you dance club wali party me bhi. And finally ek achhi pic aa gyi apni photoshoot me.  

I am looking forward to awkward Art105 and Techkriti group video calls. And I hope that someday our trip plans will get executed. Till then, take care <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
I wanna thank you for making my life easy in the last couple of months :P
Mera first Mumbai local train ka experience tere sath hi tha. I can't believe we travelled for 3 hours just to stay at Marine drive for 15 mins and eat barf ka gola and pav bhaji. It was fun though. 

PS: Your life revolves so much around dogs ðŸ˜‚
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Won't forget the way you ignored me at OAT. You were supposed to make it up to me by giving me a treat. Abhi tak nahi diya :((
Kidding! It was so much fun teasing you when you were drunk. Always stay this awesome! Deepak ne video call pe teri harkatein dikhayi thi bdw. Bottle ko fan me fekna is really fun haan? ðŸ˜›
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: I love you! Stay mine ðŸ’— don't flatter yourself bye.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Memoir dm karungi ðŸ™‚
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Start kahan se karu pta nahi. I have countless memories with you! Same batch in Allen, same college, same intern, and Antaragni oof! Could we BE any more similar? I still love the idea of going on a trip just you and me like we planned because yes we are enough. From being there for each other in JEE preparations to wiping each otherâ€™s tears in the worst heartbreaks, weâ€™ve seen a lot together. We grew together and we grew apart. And yeah I am not giving up on our dream about settling in the same city. I can say without a blink that you are a constant in my life. Love you!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
I don't know is baar yearbook ki deadline extend hogi ya nahi and tera memoir miss karne ka risk nahi lena chahti ðŸ˜‚ So here goes. 

You remember we played this game
 "the person you regret not talking to" 
If the game was "the person you regret not talking to enough", I would've named you. First year me PE se sath the but continuous interaction nahi rha. I'm so grateful I got to spend the last couple of months with you and know you better. Terrace me night outs, photoshoots, props wali party, holi, oh my god Mafia, revisiting GHT, Biriyani and Rahul sweets ki Pav bhaji ðŸ˜‚ glad to have made so many memories with you to cherish! 
Jaldi trip plan karte h.
Love you loads.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Ayeee Bhorse! Lights are gay definitely. I've had one of my best trips with you. You were a kid when you used to get irritated over finance ka kaam. It's hilarious and cute. Stay the same. Tu campus kyun nahi aya? Missed you :(  Jaldi milne ka plan banate h ab and apni health ka thoda dhyan rakha kar.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Labs ko entertaining rakhne ke liye thanks! Keep sending snaps. All the very best for your future! :))
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Yo Deeksha. I didn't know tu whiskey neat peeti h ðŸ˜‚ Us din ki party was so much fun because of your presence. Terrace pe dance karne me bohot maza aya tha. You're really cool and you bring so much positivity whenever you enter a room. And I've never told you this but you have the sweetest voice. I wish humne or pictures click ki hoti sath me. Pragya ko pareshaan karte h chal.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: You fashion diva! Thanks for the earrings and your orange top. I wish we were good friends when we went to Pondicherry tab we barely talked but it would be so much more fun to go on a trip with you now and smoke joints but this time without you testing positive the very next day. We couldnâ€™t have that daru party jisme Jai lane wala tha daru! Also thanks for your plans to scare me off by instructing everyone to act in front of me like the Ouija board was real or by making me watch a horror movie jisme bhoot end me marta nahi h ðŸ˜. Sure I was scared but don't worry, I will still be your 'primary contact' no matter what ðŸ˜›
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Bohot maza aya tha tere sath orientation me perform karne me! Loved how you performed Aashayein with so much dedication and mai aur swadha bas uski harmonies pe haste rehte the. I initially thought you were a shy person but you came out to be really cool. Hope to stay in touch!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: What do I say about you, Gj! You were the best roommate ever. I could open up to literally everyone I am friends with today because of you. I absolutely love our journey. Itâ€™s like we have seen so many ups and downs together, but somehow find our way back to each other :P. Yeah, too cheesy. I still have those cute notes you used to leave me sometimes (with cupcakes and chocolates). I hope you still have the ugly card I made you in the first year. Thanks for taking me to all those treats! And we definitely need a Goa trip together. A better one. Love ya!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Hi Dechi. Cute dp. Assignment kiya? Aero sucks. Gifs. La pino'z chalte h. Thank you for everything! You are a great friend. Ok bye.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
649 or 618 dono courses galti thi but dono me achha grade lag gya XD. You've been really helpful. Lab reports, Assignments, quizzes pure char sem bachaya h tune. Also, You might not remember this but humara oyo ka interview tha intern ka and we all were so tired and hungry with all the waiting. You were ordering food, you came to me and asked if I wanted to eat anything. Never got to say thank you. It meant a lot to me. 

You're really talented and hard working. Congratulations for IIMA! Wish you all the best for your future. Last me mil nahi paye but I hope Gurgaon me milte h?
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Pehle politely bol fir milega mask wapas :P Oh wait maine already de diya tha. Stop whining ðŸ™‚

text:
Tu bas mujhe drunk hoke mssg/call karta h ðŸ˜• We got to know each other towards the end but enjoyed a lot every time we met. I think hamare itne sare mutual friends the, we were bound to end up vibing with each other. Ek pic bhi ho gyi last day <3 
Take care and stay healthy!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: The only person jisko mai cycle pe baithe ke doubling kar pati hu. Stay cute! â¤ï¸
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: I will always remember you as the person who locked Jai in a room on my birthday. No thanks for that. But thanks for always helping me with assignments and other things (you know what). Looking forward to the day when you'll smoke a joint with us. Okay bye.

text: How do I still owe you â‚¹84?

text: Thank you for making us dance. Could see the satisfaction on your face when you saw the final 11 sec wala video. I'm gonna post it soon :) Got to spend time with you achhe se in the last couple of months only but everything was so much fun! Props wali party, holi, photoshoots and your gunde wali stories. Kabhi zarurat hui to tujhe hi phone karungi XD
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Pta h maine pehli baar tera naam aeromodelling club me suna tha. Tu meri team me tha but you never showed up XD. I'm glad ki Techkriti and intern me sath the. Tere sath maal fookna is always fun kyunki you're the only person jiski capacity mujhse bhi kam hai ðŸ˜‚ and I can brag about it. Photoshoot me bohot maza aya âœŒï¸ chup chap ab next video call me aa jana.

text: I remember tu Art105 me hamare group ka part bhi nahi tha fir bhi hamare video me acting ki thi and active rehta tha. You always had a cheerful smile on your face whenever we met. Jaldi Rajasthan ki kachori khilana! CheersâœŒï¸
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Tujhse dosti to Techkriti me ake hi hui. I have to mention Shiv Ji here because I missed tera or Anuj ka Shiv ji darshan. Hum sath me parties kar nahi paye zada. I wish tujhe see off kar pati jab tu jaa rha tha :( Next time jab bhi milenge dance classes leke ball me jayenge okay?
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Yes, the mill wala pee yaad h how drunk were we?
Still fascinated by your dance moves and your hilarious stories jo terrace pe suni. Next time achhe se execute karna Ouija board wala plan.ðŸ˜› Also, pta nahi konse flowers dale the madam apne mere baal me but I kinda like that photo. 
Free tip: Don't scare your future neighbours by shouting like anything. Chup chap chipkali bhagaya karo.
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: It was you who put me in a video as a sick girl (which I actually was at that time) and you said are tujhe acting nahi karni h tu to already beemar h, bas khaste rehna. I hope that video doesn't exist anymore. Cheers to our not so good Nainital trip and finally thanks for the bag ðŸ˜›
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
I don't drink at home. So stop sending me daru memes. First of all I guess I should say thank you for always taking care of me when mai limit se zyada pi leti thi and rone lagti thi :( 
It was always fun to be around you. Techkriti ka experience enjoyable banane me apka bada hath tha. But I will never forgive you and Devendra for making me look like a clown in holi. I still can't identify myself when I look at those photos. Please mere embarassing photos or videos delete kar dena ab to and chup chap next video call me bhi aa jana. 
Jaldi trip plan karte h please! <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: â€œJi madam khade ho jayeinâ€, Sudarshan sir ka pehla target was always you, me and Priyal would laugh our asses off! It is so much fun irritating you with my lame jokes and you giving me â€œchappal marungiâ€ wala look. Thank you train me anime dikhane ke liye wo probably first or last anime tha. I hope someday you'll listen to 'tell me if you wanna go home' and won't laugh at "oh sugar". Galaxy ka pair performance was the most fun I've ever had on stage. Kitne sync me haga tha. We never got to perform Atrangi Yaari! Looking forward to it <3. Jaldi surprise visit de ab Raipur ake. Miss you ðŸ¥º
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: I remember we worked as senior execs in Techkriti. Sonali loved you and hated me ofc despite you always being late for your coverage slot. I think it was because of your sweet humble voice XD. But it was always fun to hang out with you, be it MnP desk or yes drunk Antaragni nights!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Ye sab kaam mat karna please. Delete kar de wo video. Treat dungi tujhe. Do you know you are such a cute hugger? Missed you in campus <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Pratigya!! Remind me again humne kitne lab courses me fraud mara h? Almost sare? Second year se har course me same group me rahe. Be it Soc473, AE211 or AE462 we always aced our presentations ðŸ˜‚. Or I'd just like to believe so. Will miss all the gossip we did in between classes and ohh how can I forget 351 jisme bechari pragya hamesha time se aa jati thi and we were always late or aake sirf bakchodi karte the. Thank you for bringing out the photographer in me by constantly reminding me that I was photo club secy. <3 Stay fun and cool!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: I cannot believe that time when we both got very serious about basketball and used to go to the court daily for atleast a couple of months. We thought we'd make it to the inter IIT team. ðŸ˜‚ðŸ˜‚ All those dynamics quizzes and making cheat sheet jisme we would copy the whole assignment were so much fun!!

text: Waise to second year se janti thi tujhe, some guy in my branch and Sumukh ka wingie, but jab achhe se first time mile to I was drunk and ofc embarassed myself. I think wahin se friendship start hui. I have so much to say about you, can't summarise ek memoir me. Classes ke beech me gossip, you taking my phone and texting random people, wo adhi movie, bitching about a particular set of people (we still do it), idhar udhar khana and na jane kitni cheezon pe ek dusre ko tease karna. It has been an utter pleasure knowing you! Thanks for making my iitk journey so much fun. Hope to always stay in touch. Lastly, I am very happy to have witnessed drunk Pulkit Pandey!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Century maarega tu ðŸ™‚

text: I love how carefree you get when you're drunk ( itna carefree ki you don't care about being alive?) Yeah you owe me a treat for saving your life in Goa. We did a good job at the MnP desk. Log apna wallet chhod ke jate the and tu announce karta tha XD. I didn't know you were so emotional when you cried at Anany's poem. Stay the same!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Yo Ritika! We didn't hang out much in the end but we have had fun together during fests and birthdays. Thanks for being a constant reminder that I need to clean my room. Stay cute and chubby! <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Jagggaaaa! Tu bohot cute h. Humlog first time to Sumukh ke through hi mile the. Mth101 padhane ke liye thanks. Mostly jab apni baat hoti thi, hamesha ek dusre se treat maangte rehte the. Meri treat pending reh gayi ðŸ™ Jaldi milne ka plan banate h fir. Take care <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Hum dono mostly group me hi hang out karte h but I have always enjoyed your company. Also, hum dono ki photos achhi ati h sath me (I love Mocha wali pic). Antaragni me mujhe or Priyal ko kafi sambhala h tune. Meri fav Udaipur ki memory with you is when we were drunk and still won in sequence. Accept this you are terrible at explaining games, but terrific in playing them ðŸ˜›
Hope to go on many more trips with you and let's stay connected? See you soon!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Can I just take a moment and tell you how grateful I am to God for sending you to iitk? 

I cannot recall kitne years se janti hu tujhe but achhe se college ane ke baad jana. The very first time we interacted in college (after two fucking years of no communication) was during orientation when I gave a stupid answer to some question a senior asked and you made fun of me. I'm glad you did.  

You were always a good listener, you supported me in my lowest days (just like 10th class ki confession wali fight me, thanks for standing up to those korba gang fuckers, yes I still hate them plus no one from our school can see this to I can say whatever I want XD) Coming back to you ðŸ˜… you cheered me up in ways I could not imagine, horror movies were no more horror with you. I will take credit for getting you drunk and ofc for that pic with the girl in fairy dress. Abhi to trips pe jana h or job life me teri help bhi karna h. Jaldi ati hu korba milne. Till then, take care and vaccine lagwa lena! <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Swadhaaaa! I will never forget that moment when I came to your room, and your mom said, â€œYe Avani hogi.â€ You hadnâ€™t even shown her my picture, but she knew right away because you described me as Avani hamesha smile karte rehti h. It was cute. I regret not being active in the club when you were Coordi, but glad ki we got to laugh about the club memories last month me. Aashayein harmonies, crushing on XYZ(you know who), treasure hunt, UC wali treat Dosa ke sath (both of us were trying so hard to cut the social awkwardness) and ofc Swinggg. You are the loveliest and best nap partner ever! Please bring cake to our trip (if it happens). 
PS: Thanks for taking a special interest in my love life. :P
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Hello sister. Yeah.. No. Hi bro. We had a dysfunctional family ðŸ˜‚ I remember it was the third day in campus, you and me talked all night in the balcony. I knew right away you're the coolest. I don't think first year ke baad we met itna zada but somehow I always found you lift me. What was that?
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Well, tere bare me pehli baar to kahin or se hi suna tha (you know who) but yeah mainly to soc group ke karan dosti hui. I can surely say OAT wala night out was one of the best night outs. We laughed a lot, connected over discussion of ghosts, watched the three legged dog run faster than anyone, and rooftop par music sunna was also nice. I think the Utkarsh I knew before the lockdown and the Utkarsh I met in these last months were two different people. You worked on your sense of humor :P.  Few points I want you to keep in mind - 
1. Kabhi sober hoke bhi text kiya kar
2. Keep sending me dark documentaries
3. Do not steal my food again
4. You are an amazing person and really easy to talk to. Don't ever change that.
5. Dancer to achha hai hi, never knew you sing so well. Keep practicing! 
6. Next time milenge to please no ignoring each other :P 
7. And stay in touch <3
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text: Ayee Tandon! Tune bola tha kanpur ghumayega. That's still pending. Wish you could've come to the Udaipur trip. You have a great sense of humour. Let's connect and play dumb C sometime. Have fun with healthy food in Chennai!
author: Avani  Shrivastava

text:
Yassshhhh Bahetiiiii! 
Itne kam time me kisise itni achhi dosti ho jayegi pta nahi tha. Pehle to mostly hum fest wagar me milte the jab mai bhand hoti thi or tujhe rabbit pe Goa chalne bolti thi. But lockdown ke baad hi I got to know you achhe se. I wish pehle bhi hang out kiya hota. I don't understand how you manage to be so efficient and yet super chill. You've inspired me a lot. Thanks to you I started reading 5 pages a day. Last day of campus will always be memorable because you said goodbye in the sweetest possible way. And I am sorry for not coming to your birthday celebration. Will explain the reason sometime dm pe ðŸ˜… 
I guess there's no need to say stay in touch because we will right? Take care till we meet again!
author: Avani  Shrivastava
